languages.text: Часовые снаружи были отозваны, огонь потушен, и в корабле воцарилась тишина — испуганные люди замерли, боясь выдать себя хотя бы шепотом.
The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.
languages.original_text: Часовые снаружи были отозваны, огонь потушен, и в корабле воцарилась тишина — испуганные люди замерли, боясь выдать себя хотя бы шепотом.

traits.locale_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.
The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.
The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.
The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

languages.text: 所有哨兵走进了船舱，熄灭了火把。船上一片寂静，被吓坏了的队员们一动不敢动，生怕一不小心暴露了自己。
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: 所有哨兵走进了船舱，熄灭了火把。船上一片寂静，被吓坏了的队员们一动不敢动，生怕一不小心暴露了自己。

languages.text: 見張りを中へ運び込んで火を消す。沈黙が船内を支配する…怯えた隊員は身じろぎもせず、居場所を告げることを恐れてひそひそ話さえしない。
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: 見張りを中へ運び込んで火を消す。沈黙が船内を支配する…怯えた隊員は身じろぎもせず、居場所を告げることを恐れてひそひそ話さえしない。

languages.text: Los guardias irrumpen y extinguen el fuego. El silencio reina en la nave; el escuadrón, presa del miedo, no mueve ni un músculo por miedo a delatarse con un simple susurro.
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: Los guardias irrumpen y extinguen el fuego. El silencio reina en la nave; el escuadrón, presa del miedo, no mueve ni un músculo por miedo a delatarse con un simple susurro.

languages.text: Le feu est éteint et les sentinelles reçoivent l'ordre de rentrer dans le vaisseau où s'installe un profond silence. Ses occupants effrayés ne bougent pas d'un pouce, de crainte de révéler leur présence au moindre murmure.
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: Le feu est éteint et les sentinelles reçoivent l'ordre de rentrer dans le vaisseau où s'installe un profond silence. Ses occupants effrayés ne bougent pas d'un pouce, de crainte de révéler leur présence au moindre murmure.

languages.text: Die Wachen kommen herein, und das Feuer wird gelöscht. Im Schiff herrscht Schweigen – die verängstigten Menschen rühren sich nicht und fürchten, sich schon durch ein Flüstern zu verraten.
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: Die Wachen kommen herein, und das Feuer wird gelöscht. Im Schiff herrscht Schweigen – die verängstigten Menschen rühren sich nicht und fürchten, sich schon durch ein Flüstern zu verraten.

languages.text: Nöbetçiler içeri alınıp ateşler söndürülüyor. Gemiye sessizlik hâkim oluyor. Ürkmüş insanlar, bir fısıltının bile kendilerini ele vereceğinden korkarak kılını kıpırdatmıyor.
languages.original_text: The sentries are brought inside and the fire is extinguished. Silence reigns in the ship — the frightened people do not move a muscle, afraid to give themselves away by so much as a whisper.

traits.locale_text: Nöbetçiler içeri alındı ve yangın söndürüldü. Gemide bir sessizlik hakimdi. Ürkmüş insanlar, bir fısıltının bile kendilerini ele vereceğinden korkarak kılını kıpırdatmıyordu.
